channel.title: CVE Feed for TooTallNate -- Java-WebSocket
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TooTallNate -- Java-WebSocket

item.title: CVE-2020-11050|2024-08-04T11:21:14.437Z -- tootallnate -- java-websocket
item.description: In Java-WebSocket less than or equal to 1.4.1, there is an Improper Validation of Certificate with Host Mismatch where WebSocketClient does not perform SSL hostname validation. This has been patched in 1.5.0.
